name: Apolitical Game (Lo-Fi)
description:
Tired of ~POLITICS~ seeping into the art you consume? You're in luck! Apolitical Game is just the game for you!

Apolitical Game is a game entirely devoid of political opinion, bias, agenda, or humanity in any way. It will not challenge your thinking in any way. Just the way you always wanted.

It has not ever been playtested to avoid any outside influence.

Salutation.
